name: Knife Throw ( a KNIFE HIT replica )
name_original: Knife Throw ( a KNIFE HIT replica )
description:
As I was challenged to create a replica for KNIFE HIT in less than 12 hours. 

And because yes I am stupid enough to accept such a challenge, So here it is my attempt to recreate KNIFE HIT.

I also added some modifications of course to add my personality to the game.

Mainly the game is that you click to throw knives at a rotating wood log and the more knives you shoot the higher your score is.

However if you shot two knives on each other you lose lives and consequently it will be game over.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget to Subscribe to my YouTube channel to see the creation video and DevLog of it.

Channel Link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcUqROHhFpvVrRJgKUBa1YQ
